name: vIST/e

screenshots.caption: CC combination visualization glyphs and fibers (advanced lighting)
Volume rendering of T1-weighted MRI with clipping planes
Combined visualization DTI and HARDI glyphs rendered using interactive ray tracing
DTI tensor glyphs rendered using interactive ray tracing
Illustrative bundles rendering combined with streamtubes

short_description:
vIST/e is a C++ application that allows interactive visualization of various kinds of imaging datasets, both simple scalar data as well as complex high-dimensional data such as diffusion tensor imaging (DTI) and high angular resolution imaging data (HARDI). vIST/e is based on VTK, Qt and is designed as a plugin system which allows it to be extended in a flexible way.

vIST/e emerged from being the main research tool of Imaging Science and Technology Eindhoven (IST/e), a major imaging group Eindhoven University of Technology, the Netherlands which brings together all university faculties involved in medical or industrial imaging.

vIST/e source code is hosted at the SVN repository at TUDelft. We have made this choice because of the greater flexibility (such as defining private branches). Please see the 'Code' section for details about checking out the vIST/e source code.
summary: Interactive visualization of DTI, HARDI and other complex imaging data
